com.xlpoolsion.server.networking

Class NetworkRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xlpoolsion.server.networking.NetworkRouter

  • public class NetworkRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class responsible for routing messages to and from the GameController, using a MutlithreadedServer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeServer()
      Closes the server
      boolean[] getConnectedClients()
      Gets which clients are connected.
      static NetworkRouter getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the NetworkRouter (singleton class)
      int getNConnectedClients()
      Gets the number of clients connected to the server.
      void removeClient(int clientId)
      Removes the client with given id from the server data structures.
      void sendToAll(ServerToClientMessage msg)
      Sends the passed message to all the connected clients
      void sendToAllExcept(int clientId, ServerToClientMessage msg)
      Sends the passed message to all clients except the one with the passed id
      void sendToClient(int clientId, ServerToClientMessage msg)
      Sends the passed message to the client with the specified id
      void setServer(MultithreadedServer server)
      Sets the current server to the passed one

      • getInstance

        public static NetworkRouter getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the NetworkRouter (singleton class)
        Returns:
        Instance of the NetworkRouter

      • setServer

        public void setServer(MultithreadedServer server)
        Sets the current server to the passed one
        Parameters:
        server - The server to use for routing purposes

      • sendToAll

        public void sendToAll(ServerToClientMessage msg)
        Sends the passed message to all the connected clients
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to send to all clients

      • sendToClient

        public void sendToClient(int clientId,
                         ServerToClientMessage msg)
        Sends the passed message to the client with the specified id
        Parameters:
        clientId - Id of the client to send the message to
        msg - Message to send to the client

      • sendToAllExcept

        public void sendToAllExcept(int clientId,
                            ServerToClientMessage msg)
        Sends the passed message to all clients except the one with the passed id
        Parameters:
        clientId - Id of the client that will not receive the message
        msg - Message to send

      • closeServer

        public void closeServer()
        Closes the server

      • getConnectedClients

        public boolean[] getConnectedClients()
        Gets which clients are connected. In case the server is closed, returns an empty array.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean array in which each index corresponds to a certain client and indicates if he is connected or not.

      • getNConnectedClients

        public int getNConnectedClients()
        Gets the number of clients connected to the server.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of clients connected to the server. In case the server is closed, returns 0.

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(int clientId)
        Removes the client with given id from the server data structures.
        Parameters:
        clientId - Client to remove
